keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Rodriguez’s playing time with the Spanish club has been limited the past two years, but he will face the United States for his national team in its first match at the Copa América Centenario.

headline.print_headline: Overshadowed in Spain, but Back in Spotlight
headline.main: Real Madrid’s James Rodriguez Looks to Emerge From Shadows for Colombia

snippet: Rodriguez’s playing time with the Spanish club has been limited the past two years, but he will face the United States for his national team in its first match at the Copa América Centenario.
abstract: Real Madrid midfielder James Rodriguez hopes 2016 Copa America Centenario will help him get back onto world stage; is busy preparing with Colombia national team for first-round match against United States.
